name: Build Your Vehicle
description:
Build your dream car today, in Build Your Vehicle!

Tired of your run down, clunky pile of scrap? It’s time to switch it up and have fun along the way! Race to the finish line, and show off your great new ride in our latest hit creation! With some fine-tuning, will your car reach the end of the road?

Swipe left and right to collect your car parts and navigate the road ahead. With obstacles to face off against along the way, which part you choose is key to completing the race.

Build Your Vehicle features
-Create and drive your own car
-Avoid obstacles and pitfalls
-A variety of tracks and vehicles to enjoy!
